ygData.subject: Re: Weapon question
ygData.msgSnippet: I just made lvl 12 myself and have been carrying a Minotaur Axe since around lvl 7, got it for a mere 7 plat but it routinely hits for 17+, with minimal delay
ygData.messageBody:
I just made lvl 12 myself and have been carrying
a Minotaur Axe since around lvl 7, got it for a
mere 7 plat but it routinely hits for 17+, with
minimal delay (dly is only 35). I also have a Velium
Longsword that a high level strager twinked me with, I was
prepared to pay around 30 plat for it. It doesn't hit for
as much as the axe, but is magical and so makes
short work of Willowisps. <br><br>I really like the axe
because its delay is short but long enough that I can
cast the fire spell or snare usually without
interuption.
